location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, encloses the first of exchange (not included) of a set of bills relating to camaliens [camelines] furnished to the Marine officers stationed on the Island of Keshme [Qeshm].
